mdRecord.dcterms:title: Poorly Handwritten Corespondence
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Very poorly written item in pencil. Transcribed to the extent possible. Not sure why it is part of Stigleman collection as it makes no reference to the Stiglemans. It does mention the Hatfields and McCoys and an incident that occurred in Floyd. 1 original page and two photocopied pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
